original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 7.1. Kusalattika
analyzed: kusalattika

original: Hetu-ārammaṇa
analyzed: hetu ārammaṇa

original: Namo tassa Bhagavato Arahato Sammāsambuddhassa.
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—akusalaṁ abyākataṁ
analyzed: na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā akusalam

original: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca akusalā abyākatā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
analyzed: ekam khandham paṭicca akusalāḥ abyākatā tayo khandhāḥ citta samuṭṭhānañca rūpam pe

original: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā citta samuṭṭhānañca rūpa na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo
analyzed: na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ ca na abyākataḥ ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ ca na akusalo ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā pañca

original: Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ

original: paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato
analyzed: paṭicca na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na akusalam dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo ca naabyākato
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na akusalam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ ca na abyākataḥ

analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā na akusalam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ ca na akusalo

analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā pañca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca

original: naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo ca naabyākato
analyzed: na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ ca na abyākataḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo ca naabyākato
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ ca na abyākataḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ ca na akusalo

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā cha

original: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam ca na abyākatañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam ca na abyākatañca dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam ca na abyākatañca dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: na kusalam ca na abyākatam ca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ ca na abyākataḥ ca dhammāḥ uppajjanti

analyzed: hetu paccayā na kusalam ca na abyākatam ca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ ca na akusalo ca dhammā

analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā pañca

original: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na akusalam ca na abyākatam ca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na akusalañca na abyākatañca dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na akusalam ca na abyākatañca dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti

analyzed: dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā pañca

original: Nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalañca

original: naakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalañca
analyzed: na akusalañca dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalañca

original: naakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na akusalañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ ca na akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇa paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: (Sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṁsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vārampi paccaya vārampi nissaya vārampi sa saṭṭha vārampi sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa

original: Hetu-ārammaṇādi
analyzed: hetu ārammaṇa ādi

original: Nakusalo dhammo nakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo …pe…. Nakusalo dhammo
analyzed: na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ na kusalassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ pe na kusalaḥ dhammo

original: nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nakusalo dhammo naakusalassa dhammassa
analyzed: na kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ na akusalassa dhammassa

original: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nakusalo dhammo naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ na abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. Nakusalo dhammo nakusalassa ca naabyākatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: paccayaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ na kusalassa ca na abyākatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. Nakusalo dhammo naakusalassa ca naabyākatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: paccayaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ na akusalassa ca na abyākatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. Nakusalo dhammo nakusalassa ca naakusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha.
analyzed: paccayaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ na kusalassa ca na akusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ cha

original: Naakusalo dhammo naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha.
analyzed: na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ na akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ cha

original: Naabyākato dhammo naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha.
analyzed: na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ na abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ cha

original: Nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha.

original: Naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha.
analyzed: na akusalaḥ ca na abyākataḥ ca dhammā na kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ cha

original: Nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha.
analyzed: na kusalaḥ ca na akusalaḥ ca dhammā na kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ cha

original: Nakusalo dhammo nakusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo … anantarapaccayena
analyzed: na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ na kusalassa dhammassa adhipati paccayena paccayaḥ anantara paccayena

original: paccayo … samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena
analyzed: paccayo samanantara paccayena paccayo sahajāta paccayena paccayo aññamañña paccayena

original: paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena
analyzed: paccayaḥ nissaya paccayena paccayaḥ upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ purejāta paccayena

original: paccayo. Nakusalo dhammo naakusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe… nakusalo
analyzed: paccayaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ na akusalassa dhammassa purejāta paccayena paccayaḥ pe na kusalaḥ

original: dhammo nakusalassa ca naakusalassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … cha.
analyzed: dhammaḥ na kusalassa ca na akusalassa ca dhammassa purejāta paccayena paccayaḥ cha

original: Naakusalo dhammo naakusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. Naakusalo dhammo
analyzed: na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ na akusalassa dhammassa purejāta paccayena paccayaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammo

original: nakusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe… naakusalo dhammo nakusalassa
analyzed: na kusalassa dhammassa purejāta paccayena paccayaḥ pe na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ na kusalassa

original: ca naakusalassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … cha.
analyzed: ca na akusalassa ca dhammassa purejāta paccayena paccayaḥ cha

original: Nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā nakusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: nakusalaḥ ca naakusalaḥ ca dhammā nakusalassa dhammassa purejāta paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā naakusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo
analyzed: na kusalaḥ ca na akusalaḥ ca dhammā na akusalassa dhammassa purejāta paccayena paccayaḥ

original: …pe… nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā nakusalassa ca naakusalassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena
analyzed: pe na kusalaḥ ca na akusalaḥ ca dhammā na kusalassa ca na akusalassa ca dhammassa purejāta paccayena

original: paccayo … cha. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paccayaḥ cha saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe chattiṁsa, adhipatiyā pañcatiṁsa, anantare catuttiṁsa,
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe chattisa adhipatiyā pañcatisa anantare catuttisa

original: samanantare catuttiṁsa, sahajāte ekūnatiṁsa, aññamaññe catuvīsa, nissaye catuttiṁsa,
analyzed: samanantare catuttisa sahajāte ekūnatisa aññamaññe catuvīsa nissaye catuttisa

original: upanissaye chattiṁsa, purejāte aṭṭhārasa, pacchājāte aṭṭhārasa, āsevane catuvīsa,
analyzed: upanissaye chattisa purejāte aṭṭhārasa pacchājāte aṭṭhārasa āsevane catuvīsa

original: kamme ekūnatiṁsa, vipāke nava, āhāre ekūnatiṁsa …pe… sampayutte catuvīsa, vippayutte

original: sattavīsa …pe… avigate catuttiṁsa.
analyzed: sattavīsa pe avigate catuttisa

original: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
analyzed: yathā kusala ttike pañhāvārassa anulomam pi paccanīyam pi anuloma paccanīyam pi paccanīya anulomam pi gaṇitam evam gaṇetabba
